Megatron Revived:

"In some aspects you are correct," the clone said, turning to the 
Maximal.  "But while my body is a modified clone of the original, my 
spark is something else.  You see, a Quintesson caused the madness in 
Megatron that caused him to try to take over Cybertron.  He lost his 
memory of his family, but I not only have the memory of his exploits 
as Emperor, but also of his family.  Am I a clone, or better than the 
original?"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord::
> 
> "But if you're revivied... you some how... must be cloned or... at 
> least I... Understand that.."said the male "and as clone you're not 
> guilty what have done Megatron... you have the name but essnce it's 
> difenrent"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Megatron Revived/ Organics:
> >  
> > "The price of fame," the clone said grimly.  "I do not suppose I 
> should expect much.  After all, Most Maximals as well as Autobots 
> believed the biased reports of a few wound up upstarts.  I really 
> don't want to go in there, but I have no other place to go."
> >  
> > "Aw, you don't like being a celebrity?  I guess time even changed 
> you, the unshaking foundation of our litle family." Organics said.
> > She decided to give her step brother a break, he didn't need all 
> the stress.
